mdRecord.dcterms:title: One Big Hit After Another: 52nd Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the 52nd season of the Barter Theatre, 1984. Productions include: Tintypes by Mary Kyte, Mel Marvin, and Gary Pearle, April 20- May 12 | Crimes of the Heart by Beth Henley, June 6-24 |Good Doctor by Neil Simon, June 27- Jul 15 | Artichoke by Joanna M. Glass, July 18- Aug 5 | Mass Appeal by Bill C. Davis, Aug 8-26 | Promenade, All! by David V. Robison, Aug 29- Sep 16 | Bell Book and Candle by John Van Druten, Sep 19- Oct 7.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
